title: About
content:
About the site

This site uses Jekyll FLAT FILE CMS.
-No, I dont use a database.

It is mirrored on the zeronet:

southernhedgehogs.bit


(you can serve a copy of it too!)	
-But you cant get there from here without running some (python) software.

YOU KNOW what this site is about. (why are you looking HERE?)

Why did I make an INDEPENDENT website?

WHY IN HELL would anyone want an INDEPENDANT WEBSITE apart from Blogger,wordpress,etc?
This is why

Pay attention to the fluke on the whale.

Methinks the system is rigged torwards SILOS
(Who can tell you what to say, and what not to say.)

social media

Professional accounts are one thing- do not mince them- with personal accounts, please.

I have seen loads of complaints that start like this:

    Well my friends dont like (you, your website...)


ASK ME IF I CARE?
ASK ME IF I SOULD CARE?

-Its not up to your friends to dick-tate my life(or me- or what I have to say).
-If this was real life, Id say:

    Move out
    Find another place to hang
    Find other friends
    LEAVE
    Enjoy your clic (and one-sided banter)
    or Id ask you to walk away and never see me again.


(you cant do all these online)

Maybe instead of BITCHING about responses that you invite into the conversation on matters that matter-
you should roll with the punches and help remedy the situation?

Social media is designed to allow for comments from others.
If you dont want comments- push a BLOG. Then walk away.

This is a growing problem in phoenix. 
Many would rather instigate a fight- 
-and call on others as hitmen
-than help solve the underlying problem.

title: Gallery
content:
Ewe have arrived at the Hedgehog display case

A Nice place to see da hedgehog at its finest.




 
  
The sniffy hedgehog has a problem seeing you.
 




Theres also comic book pages about hedgehogs.No, not from ARCHIE...THESE! 
Only true hedgehog keepers understand these...

title: News
Store
content:
### Hedgehog Store


![hedgehog](./images/babyhedge.jpg) 


##### You WANT (to adopt) A HEDGEHOG..

EWE need to [come find ME](./wheres-hedgehog.html), humie...theres no hedgehogs HERE yet...

NOTE:

        While we do not personally breed hoggies, more due to space and urgency. 
        We would be happy to contract out services.

        IE: Provide branding, logo, online presence..list hoggies for sale...etc.
        Especially for those already on the HWS "partnership list"        


Some breeders are turning into greedy asshats or indian givers.



Or WORSE- 

        its looking like some may be harming those that you would take home or playing "forced substitution".
        The FTC calls this "bait and switch". Its illegal. DONT DO IT to others.
        

Most breeders cant even format a website correctly most of the time.
They rely on Facebook and FB "doesnt allow the sale of pets".


While not knowing HTML isnt the problem-something discovered recently, WAS.


**DO NOT use this websites Trademark (or logos) without permission**. 
(Its been seen in the WILD. WE WERE HERE FIRST.)
WE DO NOT HAVE A LOUISIANA "HEDGEHOG BREEDER" PARTNER.


USING OUR NAME WITHOUT EXPRESS WRITTEN PERMISSION is grounds for a lawsuit. 
We dont play when it comes to things like this.


**US IP laws indicate Trademark "is effective" after 5 years without filing, or six months post filing an official trademark.**
**This website HAS BEEN ONLINE THIS LONG.**
Major Site Interruptions were due to (ICANN and) ISP non-compliance with "ICANN lockout regulations"



The hand-drawn logo is FREEWARE. 
The Japanese author states "NO COMMERCIAL USE".
All rights of it are reserved to her.
This is offered as symbolic representation ONLY.



#### Did you want to "Symbolically adopt" instead?

Thats why we are here- to help you connect the dots.
While we directly influence smaller lesser known care-ers and recues, other larger orgs like WWF and similar can also help.

Here are two links in this case:

[National Wildlife Foundation](https://www.shopnwf.org/Adoption-Center/Adopt-a-Hedgehog/index.cat)
[WWF](https://gifts.worldwildlife.org/gift-center/gifts/Species-Adoptions/hedgehog.aspx)

### Missing some UK Rescues?

Overseas rescues need to provide direct payment info to be included here.
At this point this requires WU or eCurrency (such as Bitcoin, Litecoin, etc.) details.
		
No, this info isnt going to be given out- its used for internal records only when the donations arrive.	

This site/organization cannot (and WILL NOT) help YOU overseas in the UK, if we dont have your payment info.	
This is an effort to globalize efforts to help the hedge. Not everyone lives in the UK.

#### What we need from your UK org to be included

Credit Cards /online processing:

Shopify and Stripe can **accept** donations (in USD) to US from "our clients cards" 
(its not setup right now -but we have an account)

VISA/AMEX/MASTERCARD CANNOT and often WILL NOT help "in international regards".
Very few ATMs overseas are "international use" and most cards have forced "vacation policies" restricting 
"international transactions" online.

(We have a problem buying from ebay from time to time because of this.)



Payment will be made to YOU , (the UK care-er) in the following manners:


PayPal:

		SORRY. NO.
		
Paypal has "scamming issues" with "international funds" for some reason.
Why YOU put up with asking for credit cards from overseas clients- is beyond us- with this scam going on.


For Cash(WU):

		We need to know where and how to send a "Western Union wire" to you.
		(This will be checked -as best possible- for accuracy- before anything is sent)

NOTE: 

		WESTERN UNION HAS HIGH FEES, BITCOIN (and alts) DO NOT

Under NO CIRCUMSTANCES are we becoming a man-in-the-middle WU agent. 
(There are enough scams going on)


The donation becomes property of SOUTHERN HEDGEHOGS, THEN as WE direct it- goes overseas to UK care giver.
(We ALREADY HAVE THE FUNDS BEFORE THE WU IS INITIATED.)

Although we have very little overhead, nobody will be making WU demands of US.
If caught, this will be reported to FBI and Homeland Security.
(FBI has international reach)


There will most likely be a few days delay minimum before WU is re-sent overseas to prevent fraud.
We will only be acting on "what is recieved", not "pledges", so DO NOT ASK.

Local (to US) breeders and care givers have PRIORITY- as this organization is based in the US.




For Coins(BTC/LTC/ETH):

		We only need GDAX (or coinbase) username, or COIN wallet ID (public key).
		Skrill, CoinBase, COIN WALLET(directly), etc. cash out in your local currency- not USD.

Coinbase, GDAX, Skrill are sent directly to your account.
COIN WALLET(ID) payments are handled ON THE NETWORK, directly from us.It is completely P2P in nature.

Once sent- we have nothing to do with it. Its very much like WESTERN UNION.
You wait for network confirmation, and send to an exchange or system(like coinbase) of choice and you get FIAT.(CASH)


The issues with "outsiders altering a websites COIN DEPOSIT addresses" are not possibe- 

		1- THERE IS NO DATABSE. (Jekyll outputs FLAT HTML- this site is rendered locally, then uploaded)
		2- WE DONT POST THAT INFO DIRECTLY ANYMORE.
		
This "HACK" would require either completely hacking personal computers(obvious) or completely hacking our ISP
just to rewrite one line of HTML- which can get over-ridden at any time BY US.	
(Its not worth the effort)	



Not accepting Bitcoin, (or cryptocurrencies in general) is a YUGE financial mistake.
You are limiting business transactions at your country's borders.
With exception of WU- other "financial companies" will not solve this headache for you.




### Legal (Financial) 

-This site (and organization) is/are born and raised in Phoenix,AZ.
All Legal questions fall under US and AZ laws and are dealth with accordingly.

(I dont see why you couldnt write this off on your taxes- once we acquire 501c3 status.
However, I would not recommend doing so until "notice is posted".
YOU WILL SEE IT PROUDLY POSTED.)



### Hedgehog-like Products offered:

There are awesome products, a lot come from China (1 week airmail is the solution, with added cost)
The "SLOW BOAT from CHINA" is a "real thing". It often takes 30 days or more for mail to arrive.


        We are searching for another commercial merchant due to dropshipping issues discovered. 
        While we dont like fraud either, neither you- nor us- should be "taken for a ride".

Please stand by.
Apologies.


-Thank you for looking.
